about.title: About Me
about.content: I am a Senior Frontend Developer with over 4 years of professional experience building modern, scalable, and high-performance web applications. I specialize in React, Next.js (App Router), TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, with a strong focus on pixel-perfect UI implementation, cross-team collaboration, and UX optimization. I work full-time at Vikarno while also handling freelance projects, including crypto dashboards and premium e-commerce platforms. I'm deeply passionate about delivering fast, accessible, and multilingual web apps, and I'm known for:
bullets: Deep integration of design into development

entries.title: Senior Frontend Developer
entries.description: I develop high-performance web applications using Next.js 15, leveraging SSR and CSR to optimize user experience, which led to improved user satisfaction and engagement metrics. I build and maintain multilingual support using next-intl, enabling seamless localization and enhancing accessibility for global users across multiple products. I design and deploy financial applications, including tools for transaction tracking and loan management, improving operational workflows and user self-service capabilities. I customize and extend the ShadCN component library, ensuring a unified and reusable UI system across projects, which cut down development time by over 100 hours. I apply advanced rendering and caching strategies to boost scalability, resulting in up to 1.5 seconds faster page load times across key routes. I perform comprehensive testing and debugging workflows to uphold code quality, decreasing production bugs by nearly 40 incidents. I work closely with cross-functional teams to integrate UI components smoothly, reducing integration challenges by about 10 major cases.

entries.title: Senior Frontend Developer
entries.description: I developed a fully functional and interactive report page using Highcharts library in React.js, enabling data visualization and analytics for over 1,000 monthly active users, leading to a 15% increase in user engagement. I implemented multi-language support in Next.js 14 applications, leveraging internationalization (i18n) libraries to support 3+ languages, improving accessibility for a global user base. I engineered scalable and performant web applications using Next.js App Router, combining SSR (Server-Side Rendering) and CSR (Client-Side Rendering) techniques to optimize load times and enhance user experience, resulting in a 2-second reduction in page load times. I collaborated with backend and design teams to ensure seamless integration of APIs and UI components, reducing integration-related issues by 20%. I conducted rigorous testing and debugging, maintaining 98% code coverage and minimizing production bugs, leading to a 30% decrease in post-release issues.

entries.title: Teaching Assistant
entries.description: I teach HTML and CSS for building and styling web pages, and JavaScript (ES6, ES7) fundamentals and advanced features to over 300 students. I instruct students on TypeScript fundamentals, enabling robust, type-safe code development, resulting in a 30% improvement in student project stability. I guide students through React.js, including hooks, routing, custom hooks, HOC, and state management. I educate on version control with Git and GitHub, including branching, merging, and pull requests, increasing student collaboration efficiency by 30%. I tutor students in testing and debugging web applications using Jest and React Testing Library, improving test coverage by 40%.
